name: zed
description: He has lots of friends. Loves silk robes.

notify: [greeting_happy] "Would you care if I got a dog? Like a really big dog?" [icon]
[greeting_angry] "My mistress told me to tell you that I'VE BEEN A VERY BAD BABY!" [icon]
quicklook: zed.quicklook001.jpg && notify [greeting_happy] "I'm Zed's friend. You're out of mayonnaise. " [icon]
zed.quicklook002.jpg && notify [greeting_happy] "I just loaded up the diswasher and don't worry, your spoons are in there." [icon]
brightness: 1 && notify [greeting_happy] "Lets turn the lights off and see what happens!" [icon]
watch: Safari 60 && notify [greeting_sad] "I need to use the internet. I need to email my students back about their term papers." [icon]
